file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-12-14-04 - CONTROL COLUMN LININGS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CONTROL COLUMN LININGS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the LH/RH control column linings. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-12-14-000-801-A CONTROL COLUMN LINING - REMOVAL CONTROL COLUMN LINING - INSTALLA- ALL 25-12-14-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-12-14 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-14-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CONTROL COLUMN LINING - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove and install the LH/RH control column linings. (2) The removal and installation procedures are the same for the LH/RH control column linings. (3) The control column linings are in zones 223 and 224. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-11-08-000-801-A/400 CONTROL YOKE - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task LH/RH Control Column Linings I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: • MAKE SURE THAT THE AIRCRAFT IS IN A SAFE CONDITION BEFORE YOU DO THE MAINTENANCE PROCEDURES. THIS IS TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND/OR DAMAGE TO THE EQUIPMENT. • MAKE SURE THAT THE AIRCRAFT IS DE-ENERGIZED BEFORE YOU DO THE MAINTENANCE. THIS IS NECESSARY TO PREVENT ELECTRICAL SHOCK OR DAMAGE TO THE EQUIPMENT. (1) Remove the control yoke ( AMM TASK 27-11-08-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-14 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the LH/RH control column linings (1) as follows: (a) Release the snap buttons (5) and the hook-and-loop fastener (4) to remove the control column boot (3) from the base of the control column. (b) Remove the screws (6) and (8) that attach the upper fairing (2) and the main-stick fairing assembly (7). (c) Disengage the main-stick fairing assembly (7) from the upper fairing (2). (d) Remove the main-stick fairing assembly (7) and the upper fairing (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-14 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL LH/RH Control Column Linings - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 223 224 B DET. A 2. UPPER FAIRING 1. CONTROL COLUMN C LINING 6. SCREW (3) 3. CONTROL CONTROL COLUMN COLUMN BOOT (REF.) 4. LOOP-AND-HOOK FASTENER DET. B 7. MAIN-STICK FAIRING ASSY 5. SNAP BUTTON 8. SCREW DET. C 145AMM252601.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-14 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-14-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. CONTROL COLUMN LINING - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the LH/RH control column linings. (2) The installation procedure is the same for the LH/RH control column linings. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-11-08-400-801-A/400 CONTROL YOKE - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task LH/RH Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the LH/RH Control Column linings (1) as follows: (a) Fit the upper fairing (2) to the control column. (b) Fit the main-stick fairing assembly (7). NOTE: Make sure that the main-stick fairing assembly (7) is installed over the upper fairing. (c) Tighten the screws (6) and (8) that attach the main-stick fairing assembly (7). (d) To install the control column boot (3), fit snap buttons (5) and the hook-and-loop fastener (4) to the base of the control column. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-12-14 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the Control yoke ( AMM TASK 27-11-08-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-12-14 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
